meanings.definition: substances that decrease sexual desire or arousal
meanings.sent1: Some cultures use antiaphrodisiacs to reduce feelings of love and attraction.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the effects of different antiaphrodisiacs on lab rats.
meanings.sent3: At the funny party, they joked about serving antiaphrodisiacs in the punch to keep everyone focused on the games.
meanings.sent4: Her disinterest in romance was like an invisible cloak of antiaphrodisiacs, repelling any potential suitors.
meanings.sent5: The image of antiaphrodisiacs was so potent in his mind that he couldn't shake off the idea.

meanings.definition: something that inhibits or suppresses sexual appetite
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an antiaphrodisiacs medication to help manage his patient's excessive libido.
meanings.sent2: In some species, males produce antiaphrodisiacs to prevent females from mating too frequently.
meanings.sent3: The comedy sketch featured a hilarious scene where a character accidentally ingested antiaphrodisiacs and lost interest in everything.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was palpable, like a cloud of antiaphrodisiacs hanging over the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The effect of the antiaphrodisiacs was so strong that it felt like a physical barrier to any romantic thoughts.
